评论概述: Can't beat these for the price (and I'm rough on sunglasses)
评论详情: I'm the kind of guy who loses or breaks sunglasses constantly. So I'm always on the lookout for decent pairs that won't break the bank. These Sojos aviators definitely fit the bill.  They look pretty sharp, and they feel surprisingly sturdy for the price. I've been wearing them for a few weeks now, and they've held up well, even with me tossing them in my bag and generally not being super careful with them.  Obviously, they're not going to be the same quality as a pair of Ray-Bans or anything, but for the price, they're fantastic. Honestly, they look and feel better than most of the other cheap sunglasses I've tried from Amazon. If you're looking for a good-looking, affordable pair of aviators, these are definitely worth checking out.

I first bought these in 2018 or 19 and I can say these are my favorite sunglasses. I've bought these as gifts for other people, and as stated, I believe this is my fourth pair.  I tend to dislike sunglasses that just tint everything, as usually they aren't protecting my eyes from UV, so everything is dark and I still can't see well.  These are great at filtering out the UV with minimal tinting, even though these look full on reflective. The result is, if it's bright and sunny, it still looks bright and sunny, and I don't have to squint my eyes. There are many styles to fit whatever kind of glasses you like, the aviator style works for me. They also stay in place for the most part, so I'm not constantly adjusting them.  The glasses come with a carrying pouch and cleaning towel. The customer service is great as well!

评论概述: Just what I wanted, but poor coatings
评论详情: I wanted an inexpensive pair of aviators for kayaking, and these fit the bill....at first.  However, after a short time, the blue coating on the lens wears off.  They got splashed occasionally, but only with freshwater (no saltwater exposure).  Eventually, when I dry off the lens, the coating just rubs right off.I bought 2 pairs now, and the same thing has happened to both, so I guess I'm done.  It's too bad because these are light and fit me great.  I have other inexpensive sunglasses that I also use when paddling, and none of those have had this issue.  Fix the coating problem and I'd buy them again.

评论概述: Good for the price, if you get the right color

The black lenses are so dense you could watch an eclipse. Wish they offered a pair of magnifiers cut into the bottom to read instruments while wearing.

评论概述: (BUTER BEWARE) the only place these belong is the trash
评论详情: Upon receiving these “shades,” I was immediately disheartened by their subpar quality. The glasses were flimsy enough to be easily broken, and their packaging was inadequate, resulting in faded paint and scratched lenses.  I attempted to address my concerns to their customer service department, but they dismissed my concerns, disregarded my statements, and refused to refund my money.  If you prioritize financial prudence and time management, I strongly recommend avoiding this seller. Their practices are entirely fraudulent, and you can find significantly superior quality shades at more reputable retailers.
